summary: This bill, the "Make the Migrant Protection Protocols Mandatory Act of 2025," introduced in the House of Representatives, aims to mandate the implementation of the Migrant Protection Protocols (MPP). It proposes an amendment to the Immigration and Nationality Act. Specifically, it seeks to change the language from 'may' to 'shall' regarding the implementation of MPP, making it a requirement rather than a discretionary measure when dealing with certain migrants.
